channel.title: How to rename everything?
channel.description:
Hello. I got xx-scape and a dragonscape 525 client/source. But i wan't to rename everything in the game like when i click on logout button it says ''Click here to logout safely from xx-scape'' And when i log in i see bunch of stuff like ''Go to www.thisforum.com etc''
Its a 525 dragonscape server.

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

jamessemple:

well be more specific next time tosser

Well ask next time tosser.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2009, 04:21:50 pm[/size][hr][quote=“zarlokscape, post:1, topic:309875”]Its a 525 dragonscape server.[/quote]
well read next time tosser

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @zarlokscape zarlokscape
item.description:
@zarlokscape wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:6, topic:309875”]client.java in your server files.

Actually, the problem he has encountered is not client-sided. He needs to just open his client class and search for “Click here to logout safely…” and change it to whatever he wants. I believe that uses the sendQuest method, if I remember correctly.

i was talking about renaming objects, items and npcs etc… and also logout button is part client related too o.O[/quote]
Its a 525 not a 317…
A 525 doesn’t have client.java i think.

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

client.java in your server files.

Adam:

Actually, the problem he has encountered is not client-sided. He needs to just open his client class and search for “Click here to logout safely…” and change it to whatever he wants. I believe that uses the sendQuest method, if I remember correctly.

i was talking about renaming objects, items and npcs etc… and also logout button is part client related too o.O

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename everything?

item.description:
@zarlokscape wrote:

Yes but WHERE in my source i find it?
Its really hard :S

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

jamessemple:

ok, ik ur a first time poster but this problem is solely client related so u need to post this in client help section kk?

Client does not mean client.java. It means the game client.

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

jamessemple:

ok, ik ur a first time poster but this problem is solely client related so u need to post this in client help section kk?

Actually, the problem he has encountered is not client-sided. He needs to just open his client class and search for “Click here to logout safely…” and change it to whatever he wants. I believe that uses the sendQuest method, if I remember correctly.

Read full topic

But i wan’t to rename everything in the game like when i click on logout button it says ‘‘Click here to logout safely from xx-scape’’
And when i log in i see bunch of stuff like ‘‘Go to www.thisforum.com etc’’
